text: Went to the bridge that I ve been writing about for two yearsIt s always been my bridge of choice  how I planned on going out  The first time I mentioned it by name was two years ago in my writings  I never went to it  though  It was a two hour bus ride and I was often too tired to deal with it But I went today  Not with the specific intent to kill myself  more so just to see it  Just to see the bridge I ve been wanting to throw myself off of for two years And it was a fucking beautiful bridge  The view was amazing  I looked down that   foot drop and my only thought was  Well  that doesn t look as far down as I thought it would look  And there was this sort of odd comedy in it  I laughed  I found myself fucking laughing hysterically and I had no clue why  I stood there for half an hour  just laughing to myself and looking down  It looked so fucking easy  It would take maybe   seconds to climb over the railing and disappear  I could ve been gone  just like that But I stepped away  Because I don t want to hurt my friends by killing myself  I bought myself a milkshake instead  and went home I started this journey at   in the fucking morning and just got home an hour ago  Fuck dude  all that work for nothing I guess  huh But it felt like  This may sound weird but  it felt like meeting a friend I hadn t seen in a long time  This  This fucking bridge  I talked about it for years but never fucking saw it  And now I have  And it was fucking beautiful

text: Just an emotional Gen z who needs to get over myself and my self loathingCan I rant  Vent about my problems  speak my true mind without it getting bottled up in my head  Please   For my whole fucking life I ve been told I m too emotional and I need to get over myself   Since I was   I fantasized about my life ending  But I m not serious  I m just being dramatic  Apparently   I ve tried to tell my mom and family about how I feel but they just tell me it s an excuse to get on pills because I need attention   Everyday I feel numb  The only thing I feel other than numb is sadness  The sadness burns through my arms and legs  especially in my palms  It s physically hurts   I cry like fucking   times a week  and every time I reach out I m told I m just emotional   I don t believe I have a purpose on this earth because I can t see what I could possibly bring to people  I am narcissistic  selfish  mean  vain and annoying  I have no self love and everyone that ever meant something to me hates me now   I dropped out of college because I hated it  but can t find any other path in my life   My boyfriend stares at other girls asses and talks about how other girls look good  He won t have sex with me and criticizes my outfits   Woe is me   I don t have a close family and all my friends moved away   Is ending it cowardly or is it something only people with courage do   Can t seem to figure it out Sorry for my complaining  I m just emotional  I just needed to rant
summary: Gen Z wants to end her life because she is depressed and self-loathing. She wants to get on pills because she needs attention. She doesn't believe she has a purpose on this earth and doesn't see what she could bring to people. She dropped out of college because she hated it.
cleaned: gen want end life depressed self loathing want pill need attention not believe purpose earth not bring people drop college hate
